alert.note: Alert for Ozark; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 2:59AM CDT until July 13 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Ozark County in southwestern Missouri... Southern Taney County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 259 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles east of Taneyville to 9 miles north of Diamond City to near Roberson Hollow, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bull Shoals Lake, Lake Taneycomo, Table Rock Lake, Table Rock State Park, Theodosia, Pontiac, Sundown, Protem, Rueter, Ridgedale, Long Run and Isabella. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
